snippet: It is the latest acquisition attempt by Sycamore, which has fashioned itself as a specialist in retailers having acquired the Jones Group, Talbots and Hot Topic.
abstract: It is the latest acquisition attempt by Sycamore, which has fashioned itself as a specialist in retailers having acquired the Jones Group, Talbots and Hot Topic.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Sycamore Takes 10% Stake in Express and Seeks a Deal
